Translations.Text: Pathana kara apalya palanakartyacya navane, jyane nirmana kele
Jyane manavala raktacya lothadya (golya) pasuna nirmana kele
Tumhi pathana karita raha tumaca palanakarta motha krpasila ahe
Jyane manasala te sikavile, je to janata navhata
Kharokhara manusya tara svatahvara kabu thevata nahi
Asasathi ki to svatahla niscinta (kinva srimanta) samajato
Nihsansaya, tumacya palanakartyakadeca parata jayace ahe
(Bare) tyalahi tumhi pahile, jo (eka dasala) rokhato
Vastivaka to dasa namaja ada karato
Ata tumhica sanga jara to sanmargavara asela
Kinva allahace bhaya rakhuna vaganyaca adesa deta asela
Bare paha tara, jara ha khote tharavita asela ani tonda phiravita asela
Kaya ha he nahi janata ki sarvasrestha allaha tyala cangalya prakare pahata ahe
Niscitaca, jara tyane apale va'ita vartana sodale nahi tara amhi tyacya mathyavarace kesa dharuna tyala pharaphatata odhu
Asa matha jo khota va gunhegara ahe
Tyane apalya baithakitalya lokanna bolavuna ghyave
Khabaradara! Tyace mhanane mulica man'ya karu naka ani sajada kara va (allahasi) nikata vha
